replies.body:
#KeepURF

Let's play URF again!
All for one hexakill URF.. all in one gamemode.
All I can think of is all for one, hexakill urf mode nidalee in howling abyss
Slow down there Satan! XD
I didn't see any Teemo in that post.
I think {{champion:76}} is more like Satan's mistress
That would turn League into a third person shooter.
The All for One, Hexakill, Urf {{champion:30}}
oh god, 12 spears every second.
And they all hit {{champion:17}} . The global taunt was just that strong.
That just sounds frightening to where I want to play it. xD
All for One/Hexakill/URF: All Shaco, press R, 12 vs. 12!

With a level 2 ult for Shaco, he can have a constant clone. So pretty much at level 11 it goes from 6v6 to 12v12 where there is a 50/50 chance that the person you kill will explode and kill you. Sounds epic. {{champion:35}}
BRING BACK MY URF MODE PLEASE RITO</3

I present to you, Team Revive.

bring urf back ...best game mode ever it was fabulous!{{champion:44}}
One could say it was outrageously fun.
truly.
Riot let us choose the champions and skins too! Then we'd all finally get the girl battle we want to see in this battle royal.
Or we could do pick only nidalee #CatFight
uhg nidalee is such a cougar :)
Upvote to finally get {{champion:133}} Quinn into a pro game! I'd really like to see someone show off this champion so people can recognize her talent.
You do realize the all stars aren't going to be playing these games super serious? That means that these champions wont be showcased super seriously.
Super-serious or not, this will give Quinn the chance to shine and be seen as something more than a troll pick.
Or the guy will suck, and she will forever be known as a troll pick. Never know ;)
Vote for Yorick. Make him be noticed! PLEASE GUYS WE NEED YORICK!
{{champion:83}} {{item:3070}} They do not remember Yorick Mori.
people voted for ezreal really? he was played in every damn game of urf anyways.

I did champs themed by their team.

Uh... Brand?

Why are all the champions in alphabetical order except Wukong?

It goes {{champion:11}} ...{{champion:21}} ...{{champion:62}} ?
I don't know the relevance of it, but i think it has something to do with wukong in chat being seen as "monkey king" sometimes. Monkey king starts with M so it fits alphabetically

> Monkey king starts with M
Thank you sir I wasn't sure
